title: Fully Convolutional Architectures for Multi-Class Segmentation in Chest Radiographs
abstract: The recent success of Deep Convolutional Neural Networks on image classification and recognition tasks has led to new applications in very diversifying contexts. One of these is medical imaging where scarcity and imbalance of training data has hindered rapid development of neural network related applications.
histories: * reworked motivation of the paper and contributions * slightly reduced related work overview * improved the math * added more evaluations (the old ones are still there) * added more images * added new references
* simplified math in one place * added one sentence in the conclusions
